short_summary: Procurement Request for Propane supply for La Mauricie National Park
description: Reissue of Solicitation of Offers. This solicitation of offers cancels and supersedes previous solicitation of offers number Doc3907100876_5P207-220125 dated March 8,2023. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to Offerors who offered on the previous solicitation.All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on March 29, 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Park Canada, is issuing this Request For Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition Supply bulk liquefied petroleum gas (PROPANE) to La Mauricie National Park, as and when required located in Shawinigan, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex Statement of Requirement
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for Propane Supply**
=============================================

### Solicitation Information

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3906867228
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Publication Date:** July 19, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** September 8, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
*   **Amendment Date:** August 15, 2023

### Contract Information

*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** April 29, 2024
*   **Contract Categories:** Goods (GD)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Product and Service Description

A Request For Proposal (RFP) for bulk liquefied petroleum gas (propane) supply is being issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Parks Canada Agency (PC). The propane is required for the La Mauricie National Park in Shawinigan, Quebec, Canada.

### Goods and Services Information

*   **UNSPSC Code:** 15111501
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Submission and Contact Information

*   **Contact Information:**
    *   **Name:** Sonia Langis
    *   **Email:** sonia.langis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
    *   **Phone:** [Not Available]
    *   **Fax:** [Not Available]
    *   **Address:** [Not Available]
*   **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16919720?extsite=MTY5MTk3MjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
